array.string: (SELECT IFNULL(sort_album_artist, ML3SortString(album_artist)) AS name, album_artist_pid AS pid FROM album_artist)
(SELECT (CASE WHEN season_number > 0 THEN season_number ELSE IFNULL(sort_album, ML3SortString(album)) END) AS name, album_pid AS pid FROM album)
(SELECT IFNULL(sort_composer, ML3SortString(composer)) AS name, composer_pid AS pid FROM composer)
(SELECT genre AS name, genre_id AS pid FROM genre)
(SELECT IFNULL(sort_item_artist, ML3SortString(item_artist)) AS name, item_artist_pid AS pid FROM item_artist)
(SELECT IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_series_name, ML3SortString(series_name)), IFNULL(sort_item_artist, ML3SortString(item_artist))) AS name, item_artist_pid AS pid FROM item_artist)
(SELECT IFNULL(sort_title, ML3SortString(title)) AS name, item_pid AS pid FROM item_extra)
